processes.label: ULURP
processes.description: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure for zoning and land use applications in NYC.

steps.title: Certification
steps.description: DCP certifies application as complete and begins review clock.

steps.title: Community Review
steps.description: Community Board holds hearings and issues recommendations.

steps.title: Borough Review
steps.description: Borough President reviews and advises on proposal.

steps.title: City Council Action
steps.description: Council holds hearings and votes; may modify proposal.

steps.title: Mayoral Review
steps.description: Mayor approves or vetoes; veto may be overridden by Council.

processes.label: City Budget Process
processes.description: How NYCâ€™s annual budget is proposed, negotiated, and adopted.

steps.title: Agency Requests
steps.description: Agencies submit budget proposals to OMB.

steps.title: Council Hearings
steps.description: Council holds hearings and negotiates modifications.

steps.title: Adoption
steps.description: Council adopts final budget; Mayor signs.

steps.title: Oversight & Audit
steps.description: Comptroller monitors spending and audits agencies.

processes.label: City Charter Revision
processes.description: Process for revising NYC's Charter through a commission and voter referendum.

steps.title: Commission Formation
steps.description: Mayor or Council creates Charter Revision Commission.

steps.title: Public Hearings
steps.description: Commission holds hearings and drafts proposals.

steps.title: Submission to Voters
steps.description: Approved proposals placed on general election ballot.

steps.title: Ratification
steps.description: Voters approve or reject proposed changes.

processes.label: Local Law Passage
processes.description: Process for passing local laws through the Speaker, City Council, and Mayor.

steps.title: Introduction
steps.description: Speaker schedules and introduces proposed legislation before the City Council.

steps.title: City Council Vote
steps.description: The City Council debates and votes to approve the proposed local law.

steps.title: Mayoral Action
steps.description: The Mayor signs the bill into law or vetoes it.
